subject: refactor: replace PWA banners with header buttons
body:
Simpler, user-initiated approach to PWA install and update:

**Install button** (download icon):
- Shows when app is installable and not already installed
- Chromium: triggers native install prompt
- Safari/Firefox: shows browser-specific instructions via alert

**Update button** (sparkles icon):
- Shows when service worker update is available
- Click to apply update and reload

Benefits:
- No banner dismiss/reappear bugs
- No timing issues or race conditions
- User initiates action when ready
- Cleaner header UI
- Less code to maintain

Removed:
- components/PWABanner.tsx (346 lines)
- Complex banner show/hide/dismiss state
